de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.opticsplot

Class OPTICSPlot<E extends ClusterOrderEntry<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.opticsplot.OPTICSPlot<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Cluster order entry type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Result

    public class OPTICSPlot<E extends ClusterOrderEntry<?>>
extends Object
implements Result
    Class to produce an OPTICS plot image.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
